channel.title: Compressor/Decompressor for data and gzipped files
channel.description:
I wrote this like two months ago so I could compress and decompress data files quicker than whatever was released (allinonezipper I think it was called). I did this to make cache packing data and stuff quicker. (I also wrote a cache packer, which packs the newly compressed data to a specified archive, but I'm not releasing that.)
[img]http://puu.sh/4os04/74cd274fc1.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4osas/8a796bf0c1.png[/img]
[url=https://mega.co.nz/#!3pwllRLI!XCIx2zot1tQ0_JR97_oJkj2wHQV1R8Cpek_S7a82s2Q]oremtipressor.jar (18 KB)[/url]

item.title: Compressor/Decompressor for data and gzipped files
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:10, topic:529833”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=648587.msg4362094#msg4362094 date=1378949437]

This does?
[/quote]I should rephrase my question

Why should anyone use this over winrar, is there a reason to .gzip over .rar? (There could be and I just don’t know about, it’s a sincere question)

The cache is compressed with gzip iirc, hence it being in the client hacking section[/quote]I thought that’s what he was talking about when he said this:

AtomicInt_:

(I also wrote a cache packer, which packs the newly compressed data to a specified archive, but I’m not releasing that.)

I mean I didn’t download his program, but it looks like it just compresses a folder with gzip, which could be done with the official gzip program? Idk

Read full topic
item.source: Compressor/Decompressor for data and gzipped files

item.title: Compressor/Decompressor for data and gzipped files

[/quote]I should rephrase my question

Why should anyone use this over winrar, is there a reason to .gzip over .rar? (There could be and I just don’t know about, it’s a sincere question)[/quote]
The cache is compressed with gzip iirc, hence it being in the client hacking section
